verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Njoo wangu Mfariji,
yako shusha mapaji
Roho Mungu njoo.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hekima nishushie,
Mungu nimfuatie
Roho Mungu njoo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Akili nijalie,
imani nizidie,
Roho Mungu njoo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nieneze shauri,
nishike njia nzuri,
Roho Mungu njoo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nizidishie nguvu,
n'sifanye ulegevu,
Roho Mungu njoo.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Elimu nieleze,
hakika niongoze,
Roho Mungu njoo.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Ibada niwashie,
peke nikutamani,
Roho Mungu njoo.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Uchaji nitilie,
dhambi niichukie,
Roho Mungu njoo.
